p: Five selected loci containing tandem repeats (Mpn1 and 13-16) were amplified as described earlier [ 5]. The PCR products were sequenced, and the VNTR number of each locus was determined using tandem repeat finder software ( http://tandem.bu.edu/trf/trf.html) [ 6] with settings suggested by Chalker et al. [ 7]. DNA from a reference strain M129 was used as control (type P).
